title: Strengthening Machine Learning Competencies: Swim Technique Improvement Simulation Using Constraint-Based Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Basic swimming skills (freestyle/backstroke) acquisition and VR device usage experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can increase stroke length by 10% while maintaining a swimming speed of 1.2 m/s in a VR environment.
Learners can attempt and record three or more exploratory movement patterns under constrained conditions.
Learners can analyze their movement efficiency with 80% accuracy using metacognitive strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
